DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect 12-week progressive resistance training program skeletal muscle function , glycemic control , functional capacity , quality life elderly type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.criteria: 65 year old old clinical diagnosis cardiovascular disease patient without type 2 diabetes mellitus glycated hemoglobin > 10 % pulmonary disease cancer cognitive dysfunction neurological musculoskeletal disease affect exercise performance
